title: Reasons to play Darius?
body: I'm genuinely curious to know if there are good reasons to pick Darius. I honestly can't think of any...

replies.body: Because Dunking someone is one of the most satisfying things in the entire game.

> [{quoted}](name=Unifoliar,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BtbNMR7z,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-21T18:37:02.920+0000)
>
> Because Dunking someone is one of the most satisfying things in the entire game.

Honestly can't argue with this.

But I feel like thats not the kind of reason you were looking for.

He is an excellent lane bully, he can decimate a tank by stacking his passive on them and then dunking them, he can be tanky while still possessing the ability to execute someone, and he has the potential to chain dunk people in fights if all goes well. 

Those are my legitimate reasons to pick Darius.

Pros:
-Lane bully
-Dot damage
-High kill potential, especially with his passive + {{summoner:14}}
-%armor shred
-Recent buff keeps him relevant late-game
-Variety of itemization paths
-True damage execute
-Shitstomping in lane is fun

Cons:
-Weak to kiting
-No mobility
-Still falls off
-Not quite meta at the moment
-No reliable escape if ganked
he just recently got a buff that makes him worth playing lol
